description: This notice is for a software, of type 'electronique', that is being offered By the Department of Public Works and Government Services. The Software is intended to be installed at the Health Canada department. (PSPC)
tags: software as a service (SaaS) QMS solution
full_summary:
# Electronic Quality Management Software (eQMS) Request for Proposal

### Solicitation Details ###

* Solicitation Number: [WS3922755372](#)
* Publication Date: March 23, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 23, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Solicitation Status: Expired

### Procurement Overview ###

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals from qualified vendors to provide an electronic Quality Management System (eQMS) Solution, specifically designed for Health Canada (HC). The proposed Solution must be configurable to meet HC requirements and enable the implementation, setup, and user training for the required functionality.

### Key Requirements ###

* Provide a Software as a Service (SaaS) eQMS Solution that meets Health Canada's specific needs
* Enable the scaling up of the Solution to support additional Health Canada programs
* Provide a detailed implementation, setup, and user training plan
* Comply with Health Canada's requirements for a TBD (To Be Determined) Establishment Licensing and/or Inspection program

### Trade Agreements ###

The proposed Solution must comply with the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

### Contact Information ###

For further information, please contact:

* Sue Beck (PSPC/SPAC)
* Phone: Not Applicable
* Email: [sue.beck@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sue.beck@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Related Documents ###

The corresponding solicitation can be accessed through the following website:

<http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15752256?extsite=MTU3NTIyNTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
